channel.title: untagged on thelastpointer
channel.description: Recent content in untagged on thelastpointer

item.title: The 48 Hour RPG -- Part 2
item.description: For the longest time I had this weird challenge in the back of my head: create an RPG game in 48 hours.

item.title: Keeping the site up-to-date
item.description: This site, despite not getting any traffic, is a project I very much like, and periodically I feel the need to polish it.

item.title: MyMIDIController
item.description: Recently I’ve been trying my hand at music production (again), and to this end I purchased a few gadgets, including the AKAI LPD8.

item.title: Site UI
item.description: I showed my site to a few friends again, and I have been kindly informed that they do not, in fact, give a singular fuck about the exact hour, minute and timezone of a post’s creation.

item.title: Cookies
item.description: I finally bit the bullet and added a cookie consent popup to the site. Skip to the part where I explain these cookies.

item.title: Hello World OS
item.description: A good friend of mine just found an archive of his “operating system”, the “Hello World OS”. It is basically a bootloader, and it gave me such nostalgia that I asked permission to post it:

item.title: Proposal: 1bit file format
item.description: I was recently working with user-editable texture masks, and I was a little surprized when I didn’t find a specialized image file format for 1-bit (monochrome) images.

item.title: Optimizing Site
item.description: So I showed the new site to a few friends, and as expected, they pointed out all kinds of things to fix :)
